# actionAtItemEnd

**Instance Property**

The action to perform when the current player item has finished playing.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated var actionAtItemEnd: AVPlayer.ActionAtItemEnd { get set }
```

## Discussion

For possible values, see [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer/ActionAtItemEnd-swift.enum].

## Responding when playback ends

- **AVPlayer.ActionAtItemEnd**: The actions a player can take when it finishes playing.
